about.screen.fontAwesome: Icons used in this app are from the great $linkAStart Font Awesome $linkAEnd. $linkBStart The free version $linkBEnd is used.
about.screen.text:
This app is brought to you by Tomáš Chylý, Full Stack Developer & Systems Architect. I wanted to test Flutter on desktop platforms and I got annoyed by manually working with json translations. I also liked the idea of app analyzing my code and finding translations, so I created this app.

If you have any issues with the app, UI or have ideas for improvement, please use the feedback form below. Thank you!

info.welcome.headline: Welcome!
info.welcome.text:
Thank you for trying JsTrions!

JsTrions allows you to easily manage JSON translations in your project and to analyze project code for translations usage.

JsTrions has been tested to work on production without significant issues. If you find any issues, please report them on the apps repository, issues section.
programming_languages.manage.name: New Language
project.export.name: translations
project.export.type.label: Archive
project.metadata.description: Easy to use AI assisted translations of your projects. Use JsTrions to analyze project code for translations usage, you can then easily see which translations are missing and add them. JsTrions works well with Translator provided by my Flutter package tch_appliable_core, but is compatible with any simple json translations.
